title: A commonly discussed topic, brought up yet again.
body:
Is it time you reckon, to introduce more bans?

League is only growing, and while 3 bans may have been appropriate back when there was only 50 or so champs, there is 130 (soon 131) champs now, and i personally am of the belief that there are too many champs to ban.

So what do you think? as the number of champions grows, shouldn't more bans be introduced?

the way it is now, come champs are never played because they are perma-banned, and so in every ranked game, you always vs the same champions again and again, and those champs are the really annoying ones, but just slightly (less annoying than the perma-banned ones) but still annoying enough that everyone would ban them if the perma-banned ones weren't perma-banned.

Thoughts?

replies.body: every person should get a ban. ie 10 bans per match
I would definitely like to see this happen, even for a trial run on the PBE

Sure. Maybe just increase it to 4 per side as a trial that way it's a minimal even increase.

Lets be honest though. If/when this happens they would have released 5+ more champions :^).
That's only going to make it even more difficult to snag that OTP irelia
but my tank ekko dps bruiser hybrid magic pen qss initiator distractor crit ekko support!!!!
